New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers pushed their incredible win streak to open the season to 11 games
Key Match Events: The Cavaliers slowly chipped away, eventually drawing even with the Nets at 96 a piece, then went on to outscore them nine to six to close out the game
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Kenny Atkinson admitted that the pressure of keeping the streak going is making the games feel more high-stakes
Post-Match Reflections: Atkinson said 'I don't want it to end this way.' Does that motivate you more to win? I mean we're competing and we're trying to win every game but it's kind of weirdly in the back of your mind when you're out there competing like'man, we gotta keep this thing going.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers will lose a game, they'll lose plenty more after it too. Until then though, they're making the most of this historic and entertaining ride that they're on.
Others: The team will have to navigate a 71-game grind of a schedule beyond this wild stretch
